profile:
We are open for business and we are following Covid-19 regulations. Stay Safe.

Bayview Windows is a leading Ottawa area dealer and installer of exterior windows, patio doors and entrance doors. 

Serving satisfied customers in Ottawa Valley and surrounding areas for over 30 years, we are focused on providing expert advice, superior products and impeccable services to our customers.

We do WINTER INSTALLATIONS. 

Call for a free in-home consultation, or to schedule an after hours appointment at our showroom.
hours: 8:00AM to 4:00PM - Monday to Friday + Appointments to suit you.

profile:
Ener-Tight Windows and Doors is a family-owned and operated business. Founded by Greg Moreland in 1997, Ener-Tight Windows and Doors has been serving the Ottawa and surrounding areas for over 20 years. 

Our main focus is to provide the sale and installation of quality windows and doors at affordable prices. We achieve this by keeping our overheads low and our quality high. The manufacturers we use are Gentek windows and Novatech doors/patio doors who are long-time leaders in the industry and who stand behind their products with some of the best warranties in the business. 


Ener-Tight Windows and Doors installations are done by our qualified window and door installers. We do not sub-contract out our work. All of our products meet and exceed the highest industry standards. 

We look forward to meeting with you to help you choose the best products to suit your home.
payment_method: Cash, Cheque, E-Transfer, or Credit Card
warranty_terms: Limited Life-Time Warranty on Windows and Doors
